it.polimi.se2018.model.score

Class DifferentColorRow

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.score.DifferentColorRow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PublicObjectiveScore

    public class DifferentColorRow
extends java.lang.Object
implements PublicObjectiveScore
    DifferentColorRow Class implements PublicObjectiveScore This class is used to compute the public score earned by rows with no color repetitions
    Author:
    Luca Massini, Davide Lorenzi (JDocs)
